[`func index(Self.Index, offsetBy: Int, limitedBy: Self.Index) -> Self.Index?`](/documentation/swift/lazymapsequence/index(_:offsetby:limitedby:)-x8kk)Returns an index that is the specified distance from the given index, unless that distance is beyond a given limiting index.
